sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; import { Store } from '../Store'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function ShippingScreen() { const {state , dispatch} = useContext(Store) const {cart:{shipping}} = state const {userinfo} = state const [fullname , setFullname] = useState(shipping.fullname || '') const [adress , setAdress] = useState(shipping.adress || '') const [city , setCity] = useState(shipping.city || '') const [postalcode , setPostalcode] = useState(shipping.postalcode || '') const [country , setCountry] = useState(shipping.country || '') const navigate = useNavigate() console.log(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart'))) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() dispatch({type : 'SET_SHIPPING_INFO' , payload : {fullname : fullname , city : city, postalcode : postalcode , country : country, adress : adress}}) console.log('l hoplala') } useEffect(()=>{ if(!userinfo) { navigate('/signin') } },[navigate , userinfo]) return ( <>

Sign-in

Shipping

Payment

Place Order

Shipping address

{handleSubmit(e)}}> Full Name {setFullname(e.target.value)}}/> Address {setAdress(e.target.value)}}/> City {setPostalcode(e.target.value)}}/> Postal Code {setCity(e.target.value)}}/> Country {setCountry(e.target.value)}}/>
) }
